system.description:
You have combined hunting and tracking expertise with the supernatural power of monstrous blood infusions. You gain the following benefits:

  • Your Dexterity, Constitution, Intelligence, or Wisdom score increases by 1, to a maximum of 20.
  • The creature type tied to your @UUID[Compendium.a5e-bloody-heretics.bloody-heretics.Item.eTY6NEUbkTEH3PHp]{Preternatural Awareness} feature always counts as a @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.t7ujv9cc4us40fj9]{Studied Adversary}, but does not count against your Studied Adversary choice.
  • Half your bloodblade levels count as ranger levels for the purpose of gaining the second @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.n83irh1dygryy7q8]{Stride and Seek} feature and the @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.b7og14wchzvcfesr]{Extra Attack} feature.
  • Half your ranger levels count as bloodblade levels for the purpose of the @UUID[Compendium.a5e-bloody-heretics.bloody-heretics.Item.rFdl6DX6T98SljpN]{Hemocratic Call} and @UUID[Compendium.a5e-bloody-heretics.bloody-heretics.Item.Rw64mkIKwTispsrX]{Sanguine Reach} features.
system.prerequisite: 3 levels in bloodblade, 3 levels in ranger
